pullrequest.title: add ActorCount, ActorByIndex, and ActorNameExists in Root class

content.raw:
Thanks for breaking off these changes from pull request #558, this should help them be merged faster!

It looks good to me. I started a new homebrew build because there seems to have been a problem with CI: [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=661)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/661/)
